languages.text: "Он прошептал тебе мое имя? Я... не верю, наставник. Я предана Ему. А значит ты запутался и неверно исчел Его знаки".
"Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, Mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."
languages.original_text: "Он прошептал тебе мое имя? Я... не верю, наставник. Я предана Ему. А значит ты запутался и неверно исчел Его знаки".

traits.locale_text: "Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, mentor. I am loyal to Him. And that means you were confused and misread His signs."
"Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, mentor. I am loyal to Him. And that means you were confused and misread His signs."
"Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."
"Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."
"Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, Mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."
"Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, Mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."

languages.text: « Vous a-t-Il murmuré mon nom ? Je... je ne vous crois pas, mentor. Je Lui reste loyale. Vous avez dû mal interpréter Ses signes. »
languages.original_text: "Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, Mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."

traits.locale_text: « Vous a-t-Il murmuré mon nom ? Je... je ne vous crois pas, mentor. Je Lui reste loyale. Vous avez dû mal interpréter Ses signes. »

languages.text: «¿Le ha susurrado Él mi nombre? No... no lo creo, mentor. Yo le soy fiel a Él. Debe de haberse confundido y entendido mal Sus señales».
languages.original_text: "Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, Mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."

traits.locale_text: «¿Le ha susurrado Él mi nombre? No... no lo creo, mentor. Yo le soy fiel a Él. Debe de haberse confundido y entendido mal Sus señales».

languages.text: 「あなたに私の名前を囁いたですって？私は…信じないわ、師よ。私はあの方に忠誠を誓っている。あなたは混乱して、あの方のサインを読み違えたんだわ」
languages.original_text: "Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, Mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたに私の名前を囁いたですって？私は…信じないわ、師よ。私はあの方に忠誠を誓っている。あなたは混乱して、あの方のサインを読み違えたんだわ」

languages.text: “祂真的对你低声呼唤了我的名字吗？我……我不相信你的话，师父。我忠于不死神皇，你肯定是弄错了，看错了祂的预兆。”
languages.original_text: "Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, Mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."

traits.locale_text: “祂真的对你低声呼唤了我的名字吗？我……我不相信你的话，师父。我忠于不死神皇，你肯定是弄错了，看错了祂的预兆。”

languages.text: "Hat er Euch meinen Namen geflüstert? Ich ... ich glaube Euch nicht, Mentor. Ich bin Ihm treu ergeben. Ihr müsst Seine Zeichen verwechselt und missdeutet haben."
languages.original_text: "Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, Mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."

traits.locale_text: "Hat er Euch meinen Namen geflüstert? Ich ... ich glaube Euch nicht, Mentor. Ich bin Ihm treu ergeben. Ihr müsst Seine Zeichen verwechselt und missdeutet haben."

languages.text: "O size adımı fısıldadı mı? Ben... Size inanmıyorum Yönderim. Ben O'na sadığım. Kafanız karışmış, O'nun işaretlerini yanlış okumuş olmalısınız."
languages.original_text: "Did He whisper my name to you? I— I do not believe you, Mentor. I am loyal to Him. You must have been confused and misread His signs."
